attributes.comment:
Re: USCIS-2006-0044
The proposed fee increases seem very high, adding financial burden to those of us
seeking to adopt international orphans who are in need of families. The cost of
international adoption is already unnecessarily prohibitive. Why not instead "self-
evaluate" and lower costs by geting rid of "dead-wood" (unproductive employees
and processes)? Make your processes more efficient and less bureacratic.
Please seriously consider other ways to achieve your goals without passing the
burden onto adoptive parents and the children we want to love.

Sincerely,
Katharine Hase
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Katharine Hase
